author: Meera Srinivasan
title: Mahinda convenes all-party meet on COVID-19 preparedness
description: MPs suggest reconvening of House for better coordination
content:
As Sri Lankas Parliament stands dissolved since early March, Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa convened an all-party leaders meeting on Tuesday to discuss the governments ongoing strategies in combating COVID-19 that has affected over 100 persons so far.
